article_title: GC Cheat Sheet: The Hottest Corporate News Of The Week
article_text:
GC Cheat Sheet: The Hottest Corporate News Of The Week

Law360, Chicago (May 13, 2016, 9:16 PM ET) -- The Occupational Safety and Health Administration wants to make your workplace injury data public, and law firms want to charge you more. Those stories top the in-house news you may have missed last week.



GC Tolerance for High Law Firm Rates Rises



Corporate clients are now willing to pay outside counsel $2,000 an hour, the highest level ever, according to research by The BTI Consulting Group. The previous high was $1,600 an hour. The $2,000 figure is nearly three times the average rate that clients pay...

To view the full article, register now.
